mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FA.T_CP_SALEPUTOUTYF ( VBILLCODE, DBILLDATE, BUSICODE, BUSINAME, STORCODE, STORNAME, RDCODE, RDNAME, VUSERDEF12, VUSERDEF16, VUSERDEF7, SENDCODE, SENDNAME, CUSTCODE, CUSTNAME, VDILIVERADDRESS, PSNCODE, PSNNAME, GZHJS, GZDS, GZFYS, GZKBS, PSNCODESALE, PSNNAMESALE, GGHJS, GGDS, GGFYS, GGKBS, DEPTCODE, DEPTNAME, BODYCODE ) VALUES(#VBILLCODE:VARCHAR#,#DBILLDATE:VARCHAR#,#BUSICODE:VARCHAR#,#BUSINAME:VARCHAR#,#STORCODE:VARCHAR#,#STORNAME:VARCHAR#,#RDCODE:VARCHAR#,#RDNAME:VARCHAR#, #VUSERDEF12:VARCHAR#,#VUSERDEF16:VARCHAR#,#VUSERDEF7:VARCHAR#,#SENDCODE:VARCHAR#,#SENDNAME:VARCHAR#,#CUSTCODE:VARCHAR#,#CUSTNAME:VARCHAR#, #VDILIVERADDRESS:VARCHAR#,#PSNCODE:VARCHAR#,#PSNNAME:VARCHAR#,#GZHJS:VARCHAR#,#GZDS:VARCHAR#,#GZFYS:VARCHAR#,#GZKBS:VARCHAR#,#PSNCODESALE:VARCHAR#,#PSNNAMESALE:VARCHAR#, #GGHJS:VARCHAR#,#GGDS:VARCHAR#,#GGFYS:VARCHAR#,#GGKBS:VARCHAR#,#DEPTCODE:VARCHAR#,#DEPTNAME:VARCHAR#,#BODYCODE:VARCHAR#)
